abstract: The following tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week.
snippet: The following tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week.
lead_paragraph: In observance of the New Year’s holiday, the bond markets will close early at 2 p.m. on Monday. Both the stock and bond markets will be closed on Tuesday.

headline.main: Treasury Auctions Set for This Week
headline.print_headline: Treasury Auctions Set for This Week
